ComicInfo.Title: A Rainbow in One Color
ComicInfo.Summary: Overview As Halloween night descends on the small town of Russellville, Illinois, a young girl named Lisa desperately tries to escape the terror unleashed by Michael Myers. Meanwhile, Ryan enacts his plan of revenge against Michael for the murder of his wife, but how far is he willing to go in his hunt for The Shape?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 09:00:25. [CVDB131759]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Greg Capullo, Lizzy John, Roger Robinson, Tim Seeley, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Inker: Greg Capullo, Lizzy John, Roger Robinson, Tim Seeley, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Colorist: Bob Pedroza, Courtney Via, Lizzy John
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Greg Capullo, Lizzy John, Roger Robinson, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Characters: Judith Myers, Lisa Thomas, Michael Myers
